#summary Frequently Asked Questions

==== Introduction ====

There are no Frequently Asked Questions yet. Over time this page will gradually be filled with FAQ's that reach us (for example from the [UserGroup] of pchart4mw).

==== Q & A ====
<dl>
<dt>Q: I only see a blank (transparant) image?</dt>
<dt>A: This can happen when pChart4mw does not receive any data. Make sure there is data in the chart definition and that the data is properly separated with line-breaks.</dt>
</dl>
